Sentencas: Dissolved gas analysis (DGA) is widely used in diagnosing the incipient faults of power transformer.
Titulo: SOFC Detector for Portable Gas Chromatography: High-sensitivity Detection of Dissolved Gases in Transformer Oil

Sentencas: The detector is the key component for this method.
Titulo: SOFC Detector for Portable Gas Chromatography: High-sensitivity Detection of Dissolved Gases in Transformer Oil

Sentencas: Despite various sensors for DGA application, many of them suffer from poor stability and low sensitivity.
Titulo: SOFC Detector for Portable Gas Chromatography: High-sensitivity Detection of Dissolved Gases in Transformer Oil

Sentencas: A solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) detector is designed in this paper to address these problems.
Titulo: SOFC Detector for Portable Gas Chromatography: High-sensitivity Detection of Dissolved Gases in Transformer Oil

Sentencas: The mechanism of the detector is briefly introduced, and it is fabricated in a mold.
Titulo: SOFC Detector for Portable Gas Chromatography: High-sensitivity Detection of Dissolved Gases in Transformer Oil
SOFC Detector for Portable Gas Chromatography: High-sensitivity Detection of Dissolved Gases in Transformer Oil

Sentencas: For calibration purpose, two mathematical models of the detector, i.e., double-logarithmic model (DLM) and linearity model (LM), are compared with each other.
Titulo: SOFC Detector for Portable Gas Chromatography: High-sensitivity Detection of Dissolved Gases in Transformer Oil

Sentencas: Experimental results demonstrate that the SOFC detector exhibits good repeatability at given concentrations and excellent linearity with DLM.
Titulo: SOFC Detector for Portable Gas Chromatography: High-sensitivity Detection of Dissolved Gases in Transformer Oil

Sentencas: The results indicate that accurate and high-precision measurement of H-2, CH4, CO, C2H4, C2H6, and C2H2 can be achieved using the SOFC detector and the proposed DLM.
Titulo: SOFC Detector for Portable Gas Chromatography: High-sensitivity Detection of Dissolved Gases in Transformer Oil
